profile.shortBio: Engineer focused on Bitcoin protocol and secure systems.
profile.longBio: A tech head and curious builder, Krrish got selected for both Google Summer of Code (GSoC) and Summer of Bitcoin (SoB) in his 4th semester of college. He has a passion for open-source and has contributed to various projects, diving deep into technologies like Flutter, Swift, and Bitcoin internals. He is a self-motivated learner who is not afraid to take on challenging tasks.

timeline.title: Participant
timeline.summary: Contributed to an open-source organization as part of the Google Summer of Code program.
highlights: Worked on a call-blocking extension in Flutter for the OWASP BLT app.
Developed a plagiarism detection mode integrating OpenAI.
Gained experience with native integration in Swift and Kotlin.

timeline.title: Participant
timeline.summary: Worked on a Bitcoin-related project during the Summer of Bitcoin program.
highlights: Learned about Bitcoin transaction formation, SegWit, and multisig wallets.
Dove deep into low-level transaction logic.
